content: Coty Inc  reported a surprise quarterly loss and warned that it expected retailers to reduce stocking some of the beauty products the company acquired from Procter & Gamble Co  until the second half of 2018.    Shares of the U.S. beauty products maker fell 13 percent to $17 in afternoon trading on Tuesday.
name: Coty Inc
title: Coty says some of its P&G brands to stay under pressure until 2018

content: LUXEMBOURG A decade-long battle by luxury brands to defend their image neared an end on Wednesday when an adviser to Europe's top court said Coty can block a German retailer from selling its beauty products via online marketplaces.
name: Coty Inc
title: Luxury firms' online battle boosted by EU court adviser's Coty stance

content: LUXEMBOURG  July 26 An adviser to Europe's top court said on Wednesday that U.S. beauty products maker Coty's German unit can block retailers from selling their products via marketplaces such as Amazon or eBay .
name: Coty Inc
title: Top EU court adviser says Coty can block retailers from online sales
